item.title: Crows 'expect so much more', Bombers brace for 'finals-like' clash
item.description: Adelaide coach Matthew Nicks has refused to comment on a controversial umpiring non-call, instead saying he expects more of his side, while the Bombers' belief is building ahead of next week's 'finals-like' clash against Collingwood

item.title: Bombers break Crows' hearts in an instant classic
item.description: Essendon has held on despite a late onslaught from Adelaide on Friday night to win its fourth match of the season

item.title: Roffey on game 300, epic GF and why she's a reluctant trailblazer
item.description: Ahead of her 300th game, Chelsea Roffey reflects on her first match, the 2012 Grand Final and much more

item.title: Another blow for Saints after forward suffers injury setback

item.title: Hinkley plays down Power clash with Pies, 'comfortable' with ruck tag-team
item.description: Port Adelaide can make a huge statement in its clash with Collingwood on Saturday, but coach Ken Hinkley says it's just another game

item.title: Clarkson focused on bigger picture, Roos forward set to face Hawks
